segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 8
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 8

segments.pli: 3. Gahapativagga
segments.en: 3. Householders

segments.pli: 25. Mahānāmasutta
segments.en: 25. With Mahānāma

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Sakyans, near Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Mahānāma the Sakyan went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:

segments.pli: “kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, upāsako hotī”ti?
segments.en: “Sir, how is a lay follower defined?”

segments.pli: “Yato kho, mahānāma, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti;
segments.en: “Mahānāma, when you’ve gone for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha,

segments.pli: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako hotī”ti.
segments.en: you’re considered to be a lay follower.”

segments.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti?
segments.en: “But how is an ethical lay follower defined?”

segments.pli: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti;
segments.en: “When a lay follower doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence,

segments.pli: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
segments.en: they’re considered to be an ethical lay follower.”

segments.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti?
segments.en: “But how do we define a lay follower who is practicing to benefit themselves, not others?”

segments.pli: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanāva saddhāsampanno hoti, no paraṃ saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: “A lay follower is accomplished in faith, but doesn’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They’re accomplished in ethical conduct, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva cāgasampanno hoti, no paraṃ cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They’re accomplished in generosity, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva bhikkhūnaṃ dassanakāmo hoti, no paraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassane samādapeti;
segments.en: They like to see the mendicants, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti, no paraṃ saddhammassavane samādapeti;
segments.en: They like to hear the true teaching, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, no paraṃ dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, no paraṃ atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They examine the meaning of the teachings they’ve memorized, but don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanāva atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
segments.en: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly, but they don’t encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
segments.en: That’s how we define a lay follower who is practicing to benefit themselves, not others.”

segments.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti?
segments.en: “But how do we define a lay follower who is practicing to benefit both themselves and others?”

segments.pli: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: “A lay follower is accomplished in faith and encourages others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They’re accomplished in ethical conduct and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca cāgasampanno hoti, parañca cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They’re accomplished in generosity and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca bhikkhūnaṃ dassanakāmo hoti, parañca bhikkhūnaṃ dassane samādapeti;
segments.en: They like to see the mendicants and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti, parañca saddhammassavane samādapeti;
segments.en: They like to hear the true teaching and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, parañca dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
segments.en: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, parañca atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti,
segments.en: They examine the meaning of the teachings they’ve memorized and encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: attanā ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, parañca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
segments.en: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly and they encourage others to do the same.

segments.pli: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
segments.en: That’s how we define a lay follower who is practicing to benefit both themselves and others.”

segments.pli: Pañcamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Questioned by his relative Mahānāma, the Buddha explains what makes someone a Buddhist lay follower, a virtuous lay follower, and a lay follower practicing for the welfare of all.
